articles.title: Graham Potter has freedom Thomas Tuchel didn't with mastermind Billy Gilmour plan in £2m deal - Football.London
articles.description: The Blues have changed almost everything from the club that Thomas Tuchel took over in January 2021, now it's for Potter to shape and mould.
